product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Road M3 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The women's Pearl Izumi EM Road M3 road-running shoes are tuned to give you a cushioned fit without a lot of underfoot bulk. The lightweight mesh uppers keep feet ventilated for lasting comfort. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Seamless uppers provide support and security in a lightweight, seamless envelope; nylon mesh panels feature welded thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester mesh linings wick away moisture, and are highly breathable for lasting comfort. Biomechanically tuned dynamic offset-shaped E:Motion midsoles feature a cushioned, broad platform. Energy Foam cushions forefeet upon impact and returns energy back to the runner; Shock Absorption Foam in heels absorbs and diffuses force upon initial ground contact. High-density posts at medial midfoot area are engineered for pronation control. Pearl Izumi EM Road M3 road-running shoes have carbon rubber outsoles with crash pads for long-lasting cushioning and excellent abrasion resistance.
short_description: The women's Pearl Izumi EM Road M3 road-running shoes are tuned to give you a cushioned fit without a lot of underfoot bulk. The lightweight mesh uppers keep feet ventilated for lasting comfort.
